name: Powder Сonspiracy
description:
You need to correct the mistakes of the past and make the day of November 5 great.  

To pass, you need to put all the barrels on the weak points of the building to blow up the king and his entourage.

WASD - contols
F - pickup barrel
LShift - Drop barrel
F - put barrel on platform

Game made on Unreal Engine by 4 people

Fill - GameDesigner
Jaguar - Programer
Min4uk - Programer
SergeiMuse - SoundDesigner
